| `list_mail_folders` | List all mail folders in the mailbox. Returns folder name, item counts, and unread counts. Well-known folder names (inbox, sentitems, drafts, deleteditems, junkemail, outbox, archive) can be used as folder IDs in other mail tools. Use include_children=true to also list subfolders (1 level deep). | mail-folders | ðŸŸ¢ safe |
| `forward_email` | Forward an existing email to new recipients. Attachments from the original email are included automatically.
